trans-unit.source: Specifies combinations of modifier and console keys that can interrupt the current process.
trans-unit.target: 指定的修饰符，并可以中断当前进程的控制台键的组合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ConsoleCancelEventArgs.SpecialKey%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property returns the ConsoleSpecialKey enumeration type.
Simultaneously pressing certain key combinations signals the operating system to interrupt the currently running process.
trans-unit.target: 同时按下某个键组合向操作系统发出中断当前正在运行的进程发出信号。

trans-unit.source: The two valid key combinations are <xref:System.ConsoleModifiers?displayProperty=fullName> plus BREAK (CTRL+BREAK) and <xref:System.ConsoleModifiers?displayProperty=fullName> plus <xref:System.ConsoleKey?displayProperty=fullName> (CTRL+C).
trans-unit.target: 两个有效的键组合<xref:System.ConsoleModifiers?displayProperty=fullName>plus 中断 (CTRL + BREAK) 和<xref:System.ConsoleModifiers?displayProperty=fullName>加上<xref:System.ConsoleKey?displayProperty=fullName>(CTRL + C)。</xref:System.ConsoleKey?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ConsoleModifiers?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ConsoleModifiers?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ConsoleModifiers.Control?displayProperty=fullName> modifier key plus the BREAK console key.
trans-unit.target: <Xref:System.ConsoleModifiers.Control?displayProperty=fullName>修饰符键加 BREAK 控制台键。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ConsoleModifiers.Control?displayProperty=fullName> modifier key plus the <xref:System.ConsoleKey.C?displayProperty=fullName> console key.
